items.sentence: I\'m usually in pretty good shape, but now I\'m a little overweight.
I\'ve been studying French for a long time, but I\'m not yet fluent.
I\'ve just started to learn French, so I\'m not very good at it yet.
Tom always worries about things that don\'t really matter very much.
Tom can\'t be in the car more than ten minutes without getting sick.
